name: Special Delivery – Hydrating Bestsellers Kit
categories: Bath & Body, Body Care, Bath & Body for Mom & Baby
about: What it is: A set of three mini bestsellers that build the perfect routine for mom and baby to support, hydrate, and nourish dry and delicate skin...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, and Combination..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Centella Asiatica: Visibly brightens skin while fighting the appearance of stretch marks..- Sunflower Seed Oil: Antioxidant-rich oil that conditions skin and replenishes moisture..- Marula Oil: Deeply nourishes and rejuvenates the look of skin...Ingredient Callouts: These products are vegan...What Else You Need to Know: Treat yourself with these favorites to hydrate, treat, and protect skin. Nourishing Stretch Mark Cream & Golden Belly Serum work together to replenish skin’s barrier and reduce the appearance of stretch marks. Nourishing Baby Face Cream delivers 72 hours of hydration to dry and sensitive facial skin..This Set Contains:.- 1.0 oz/ 30 mL Golden Belly Serum.- 1.7 oz / 50 mL Nourishing Stretch Mark Cream.- 0.5 oz/ 15 mL Nourishing Baby Face Cream..Clinical Results: In an 8-week clinical test with 30 volunteers, women aged 27 to 44 years old, who used the Golden Belly Serum with the supervision of a dermatologist:.- 95% saw clinical improvement in the size of stretch marks in just 8 weeks.- Clinically shown to reduce the appearance of stretch marks by 62% in 8 weeks..In a 4-week clinical test with 30 volunteers, women aged 27 to 44 years old, who used the Golden Belly Serum with the supervision of a dermatologist:.- 82% saw a clinically measured visible improvement in skin firmness, smoothness, and brightness in just 4 weeks..In a 72-hour clinical study with 22 subjects aged 22 to 67 who used the Nourishing Baby Face Cream:.- 100% experienced 72 hours of continuous hydration.- Clinically shown to provide 72 hours of moisture barrier strengthening and skin nourishment..In a 14-day consumer study with 100 children aged 0 to 4 who used the Nourishing Baby Face Cream:.- 94% felt Nourishing Baby Face Cream improved their baby‘s rash/irritation..
ingredients: -Centella Asiatica: Visibly brightens skin while fighting the appearance of stretch marks..-Sunflower Seed Oil: Is an antioxidant-rich oil that conditions skin and supports moisture barrier..-Marula Oil: Nourishes and rejuvenates the look of skin...Golden Belly Serum: .Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Rosa Canina Seed (Rosehip) Oil, Coco-Caprylate, Isosorbide Dicaprylate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea (Marula) Seed Oil, Fragrance (Parfum)**, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Flower Extract, Camelina Sativa Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Centella Asiatica Extract, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate. **100% Natural Fragrance...Nourishing Stretch Mark Cream:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Octyldodecanol, Glycerin, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, 1-2-Hexanediol, Saccharide Isomerate, Cetearyl Olivate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Olivate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Mangifera lndica (Mango) Seed Butter, Calendula Ocinalis Flower Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Zingiber Ocinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Hydroxyacetophenone, Allantoin, Bisabolol, Gluconolactone, Citric Acid, Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Extract, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Benzoate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Carbomer, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract...Nourishing Baby Face Cream:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Octyldodecanol, Glycerin, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, 1-2-Hexanediol, Saccharide Isomerate, Cetearyl Olivate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Olivate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Mangifera lndica (Mango) Seed Butter, Calendula Ocinalis Flower Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Zingiber Ocinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Hydroxyacetophenone, Allantoin, Bisabolol, Gluconolactone, Citric Acid, Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Extract, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Benzoate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Carbomer, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Nourishing Stretch Mark Cream and Golden Belly Serum:.-Start by massaging a generous layer of Nourishing Stretch Mark Cream into dry or itchy skin until completely absorbed..-Immediately follow with Golden Belly Serum, applying one full dropper to the palm of hand to warm and activate. Massage into skin anywhere stretch marks appear using light, circular motions. .-Repeat twice daily wherever hydration is needed, focusing on areas that need extra love and attention such as the belly, hips, breasts, and thighs..-Safe for daily use on sensitive skin and for use while pregnant or breastfeeding. ..Nourishing Baby Face Cream: .-For baby, gently massage a pea-size amount of Nourishing Baby Face Cream into baby‘s skin, both morning and night. .-Use liberally on dry, rough, or itchy patches on face and body as needed..-Not just for babies—nourishing Baby Face Cream provides intense hydration for adults with sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels good absorbs well havent used it long enough to see a difference in my stretch marks i just got my first stretch marks from pregnancy and i hope this helps ill come back with an update but so far products smell good ans feel good alot of reviews say it smells bad but it rlly doesnt

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the option of this kit because I have been wanting to try all three of these. I especially love the baby face cream because I have sensitive skin and it doesn’t break me out at all. I also love that the golden belly serum doesn’t feel greasy when I put it on, which is usually a problem I have with other oils.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this as a gift for a friend who just had her 3rd child.  She loved it!  Her favorite is the Golden Belly Serum -- loved the absorbency and how soft it made her skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this for 4 weeks I see a significantly improved on my skin texture and stretch marks overall. I got this set for weight loss stretch mark and it has been working wonderful. I really like the small moisturiser and thinking of getting the full size one

reviews.review_title: Oil + baby cream (purple tube no go)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product when I was 6 month pregnant and it lasted until baby’s birth date. I really loved the texture of the oil for my belly and I just finished the baby cream (my son is now 2 months old) he has a sensitive skin & red irritated cheeks and the baby cream worked fine on him. On the other side so did not like the purple cream tube, it did not smell good at all. Would definitely buy again the oil and the baby cream soon :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product, it made my pregnant belly itchy had tiny bumps. I would not recommend this product to pregnant women and rather get something unscented so it doesn’t irritate the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I do like it. It does work as it says like it reduces the look of my stretch marks by 60%, they are still visible but not so much noticeable as it was but i don’t like the scent of this product. It does have a scent which is not nice.

J’utilise les 2 produits déjà depuis le début de ma grossesse(8mois) et j’adore leurs effets, texture et odeur. Je pense que ça m’aide à ne pas avoir de vergetures ni cellulite, je l’utilise sur mon ventre, hanches et cuissesJe n’ai pas encore utilisé la petite crème pour baby puisqu’il n’est pas encore là.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Started after my first month, my skin was starting to get dry. This has been very helpful. My belly hasn't grown a lot, however, those stretch marks I have had since ever seem to be lighter and/or my skin tighter in a way.  I don't have a problem with the sent, felt “calming” to me (smells like herbs and seeds mix haha)

reviews.review_title: Smooth and absorbs but not my favorite scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just started using this so I am not 100 percent on the results. But I do not love the smell. The oil goes on smooth and is not greasy. The lotion is very smooth and seems to absorb well.. not sure if I will purchase again due to the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure if the oil will prevent stretch marks yet; too early in my pregnancy to tell. The scent makes me a little nauseous, though. The cream has almost no scent and is fairly good at moisturizing my extremely dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This set is amazing! I’ll be purchasing the full size products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Palmers tummy butter since my first trimester and I genuinely enjoy that the oil and belly cream don't leave an oily residue.  if I'm honest, I think the belly oil is the MVP, I could probably pair it with a less expensive cream and I would have the same or similar results.  I can't say whether it reduces/helps with stretch marks yet as I'm still growing, but it is a godsend for the itchy skin and general irritation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The stretch mark cream pills on my stomach which sucks. Not worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great value considering the $47 full size of just the oil is 50 ml and the trial is 30 ml! Love the oil, it’s magic - feels so good and protective. The cream has been nice on my newborn. The stretch mark cream is ok but nothing special.

reviews.review_title: Good discovery set! Good Price point!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this set after I had my baby, the stretch mark cream lasted about a month and the oil lasted about 6 weeks and I used it once a day. I am nervous to use the face cream on a newborn so I use it on my 4 year old who has sensitive skin and did not have a reaction. I would repurchase the oil and I liked the texture and did see an improvement in the areas that were applied. I had to pull out the dropper in order to get all of the product out as the dropper does not reach to the bottom of the glass bottle. The cream applied “okay” to my skin but I you also have to pump a lot of the cream to cover the areas. I wish the bottle for the cream was translucent to see how much product is left as the bottle feels light and it did not seem like there was product in there (obviously there was) so it was hard to tell when someone would need to repurchase or running low. I like the design of the face cream you don’t have to hold the product in one hand and pour the product in the other, essentially you can use one hand with this product. Overall like the name of this box, it is a good discovery set to try the products.

reviews.review_title: Great amount of product for sample size!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm honestly very happy with the sizes in this set, its been about 3 weeks and I still have product left! The face cream helps with the red irritation my son gets on his face and my stomach is way more hydrated now. I can tell that the more I use the product the more hydrated my skin stays, I'm 32 weeks pregnant with many stretch marks from my past 3 pregnancies' so I can't say anything yet about how its reduces the look of stretch marks but it defiantly helps me not feel itchy! I will defiantly be purchasing the full size of all three products and trying them out for a longer duration to see how it helps after baby comes too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Présentement enceinte, j’adore l’huile pour le ventre. Elle sent très floral. La crème pour les vergetures sent très bon et laisse ma peau très douce ! J’adore

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these products! Pleasantly surprised. The packaging is stunning and the sizes are very generous for a mini set! Will definitely purchase more :)

reviews.review_title: You get a lot for the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, the sizes are large considering it’s a sample pack. Very pleasantly surprised about that. Very good quality and packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: perfect shower gift - practical and pampers Mom at the same time
